template.name: mapper
template.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd"> <mapper namespace="${packageName}.${moduleName}.dao<#if subModuleName != "">.${subModuleName}</#if>.${ClassName}Dao">
<#-- 输出字段列 --> <!-- 字段列 --> <sql id="${className}Columns"> <#assign columnField> <#list table.columnList as c> <#-- 扣除特殊字段 --> <#if c.simpleJavaField != "regDataStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regCheckStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regSendStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regOperateStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regOrgNo"> a.${c.name} AS "${c.javaFieldId}", </#if> </#list> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.showType?? && c.showType == "userselect"> <#list c.javaFieldAttrs as a> u${c_index + 1}.${a[1]} AS "${c.simpleJavaField}.${a[0]}", </#list> <#elseif c.showType?? && c.showType == "officeselect"> <#list c.javaFieldAttrs as a> o${c_index + 1}.${a[1]} AS "${c.simpleJavaField}.${a[0]}", </#list> <#elseif c.showType?? && c.showType == "areaselect"> <#list c.javaFieldAttrs as a> a${c_index + 1}.${a[1]} AS "${c.simpleJavaField}.${a[0]}", </#list> </#if> <#-- 父表关联字段 --> <#if table.parentExists && table.parentTableFk == c.name> <#list c.javaFieldAttrs as a> b.${a[1]} AS "${c.simpleJavaField}.${a[0]}", </#list> </#if> </#list> <#-- 添加固定字段 --> a.reg_org_no AS "regOrgNo", a.reg_data_status AS "regDataStatus", a.reg_check_status AS "regCheckStatus", a.reg_send_status AS "regSendStatus", a.reg_operate_status AS "regOperateStatus", sof.name AS "regOrgName", </#assign> ${columnField?substring(0, columnField?last_index_of(","))} </sql>
<#-- 输出字段关联表 --> <!-- 字段关联表 --> <sql id="${className}Joins"> <#-- 关联父表 --> <#if table.parentExists> LEFT JOIN ${table.parent.name} b ON b.id = a.${table.parentTableFk} </#if> <#-- 关联系统表 --> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.showType?? && c.showType == "userselect"> LEFT JOIN sys_user u${c_index + 1} ON u${c_index + 1}.id = a.${c.name} <#elseif c.showType?? && c.showType == "officeselect"> <!-- LEFT JOIN sys_office o${c_index + 1} ON o${c_index + 1}.id = a.${c.name} --> <#elseif c.showType?? && c.showType == "areaselect"> LEFT JOIN sys_area a${c_index + 1} ON a${c_index + 1}.id = a.${c.name} </#if> </#list> LEFT JOIN sys_office sof ON sof.code = a.reg_org_no </sql>
<!-- 通过主键查询数据 --> <select id="get${ClassName}ByKey" resultType="${ClassName}"> SELECT <include refid="${className}Columns"/> FROM ${table.name} a <include refid="${className}Joins"/> WHERE<#assign x = 0> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.isPk == "1"> <#if x !=0 >and </#if>a.${c.name} = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} <#assign x = x + 1> </#if> </#list> </select>
<!-- 分页查询数据 --> <select id="findList" resultType="${ClassName}"> SELECT <include refid="${className}Columns"/> FROM ${table.name} a <include refid="${className}Joins"/> <where> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if (c.isQuery?? && c.isQuery == "1") || (table.parentExists && table.parentTableFk == c.name)> <#if c.queryType ?? && c.queryType == 'between'> <if test="begin${c.simpleJavaField?cap_first} != null and end${c.simpleJavaField?cap_first} != null <#if c.simpleJavaField != c.javaFieldId>and begin${c.javaFieldId?cap_first} != null and end${c.javaFieldId?cap_first} != null </#if>and begin${c.javaFieldId?cap_first} != '' and end${c.javaFieldId?cap_first} != ''"> <#else> <if test="${c.simpleJavaField} != null<#if c.simpleJavaField != c.javaFieldId> and ${c.javaFieldId} != null</#if> and ${c.javaFieldId} != ''"> </#if> <#if c.showType == 'multiselect'> AND ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} in( SELECT DISTINCT REGEXP_SUBSTR (a.${c.name},'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) as "token" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (a.${c.name},'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL) <#else> <#if c.queryType ?? && c.queryType == 'between'> AND a.${c.name} BETWEEN ${"#"}{begin${c.simpleJavaField?cap_first}} AND ${"#"}{end${c.simpleJavaField?cap_first}} <#elseif c.queryType ?? && c.queryType == 'like'> AND a.${c.name} LIKE <if test="dbName == 'oracle'">'%'||${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}||'%'</if> <if test="dbName == 'mssql'">'%'+${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}+'%'</if> <if test="dbName == 'mysql'">concat('%',${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}},'%')</if> <#elseif c.queryType ?? && c.queryType == 'left_like'> AND a.${c.name} LIKE <if test="dbName == 'oracle'">'%'||${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}</if> <if test="dbName == 'mssql'">'%'+${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}</if> <if test="dbName == 'mysql'">concat('%',${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}})</if> <#elseif c.queryType ?? && c.queryType == 'right_like'> AND a.${c.name} LIKE <if test="dbName == 'oracle'">${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}||'%'</if> <if test="dbName == 'mssql'">${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}+'%'</if> <if test="dbName == 'mysql'">concat(${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}},'%')</if> <#else> <#if c.javaFieldId == "regOrgNo"> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT SO.CODE FROM SYS_OFFICE SO WHERE SO.DEL_FLAG = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR SO.ID = SO.PARENT_ID START WITH SO.CODE = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}) X2 WHERE X2.CODE = A.REG_ORG_NO) <#else> AND a.${c.name} ${c.queryType} ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} </#if> </#if> </#if> </if> </#if> </#list> </where> <choose> <when test="page !=null and page.orderBy != null and page.orderBy != ''"> ORDER BY ${"$"}{page.orderBy} </when> <otherwise> <#if table.parentExists> <#if table.createDateExists> ORDER BY a.create_date ASC </#if> <#else> <#if table.updateDateExists> ORDER BY a.update_date DESC </#if> </#if> </otherwise> </choose> </select>
<!-- 查询全部数据 --> <select id="findAllList" resultType="${ClassName}"> SELECT <include refid="${className}Columns"/> FROM ${table.name} a <include refid="${className}Joins"/> <where> <if test="regOrgNo != null and regOrgNo != ''"> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT SO.CODE FROM SYS_OFFICE SO WHERE SO.DEL_FLAG = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR SO.ID = SO.PARENT_ID START WITH SO.CODE = ${"#"}{regOrgNo})X2 WHERE X2.CODE = A.REG_ORG_NO) </if> </where> <choose> <when test="page !=null and page.orderBy != null and page.orderBy != ''"> ORDER BY ${"$"}{page.orderBy} </when> <otherwise> <#if table.parentExists> <#if table.createDateExists> ORDER BY a.create_date ASC </#if> <#else> <#if table.updateDateExists> ORDER BY a.update_date DESC </#if> </#if> </otherwise> </choose> </select>
<!-- 新增数据 --> <insert id="insert"> INSERT INTO ${table.name}( <#assign insertField> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.isInsert?? && c.isInsert == "1"> ${c.name}, </#if> </#list> </#assign> ${insertField?substring(0, insertField?last_index_of(","))} ) VALUES ( <#assign insertJavaField> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.isInsert?? && c.isInsert == "1"> <#-- 特殊字段初始化值 --> <#if c.simpleJavaField == "regDataStatus" || c.simpleJavaField == "regCheckStatus" || c.simpleJavaField == "regSendStatus" || c.simpleJavaField == "regOperateStatus"> '00', <#elseif c.simpleJavaField == "regOrgNo"> ${"#"}{createBy.company.code}, <#else> ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}, </#if> </#if> </#list> </#assign> ${insertJavaField?substring(0, insertJavaField?last_index_of(","))} ) </insert>
<!-- 修改数据 --> <update id="update"> UPDATE ${table.name} SET <#assign updateField> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.isEdit?? && c.isEdit == "1"> <#-- 扣除特殊字段 --> <#if c.simpleJavaField != "regDataStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regCheckStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regSendStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regOperateStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regOrgNo"> ${c.name} = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}}, </#if> </#if> </#list> </#assign> ${updateField?substring(0, updateField?last_index_of(","))} WHERE<#assign x = 0> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.isPk == "1"> <#if x !=0 >and </#if>${c.name} = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} <#assign x = x + 1> </#if> </#list> </update>
<!-- 删除数据 --> <update id="delete"> <#if table.delFlagExists> UPDATE ${table.name} SET reg_data_status = '99' <#else> DELETE FROM ${table.name} </#if> <#if table.parentExists> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if table.parentTableFk == c.name> <choose> <when test="id !=null and id != ''"> WHERE id = ${"#"}{id} </when> <otherwise> WHERE ${table.parentTableFk} = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} </otherwise> </choose> </#if> </#list> <#else> WHERE<#assign x = 0> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.isPk == "1"> <#if x !=0 >and </#if>${c.name} = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} <#assign x = x + 1> </#if> </#list> </#if> </update>
<!-- 修改四个数据状态 --> <update id="update${ClassName}Status"> UPDATE ${table.name} set reg_data_status = ${"#"}{regDataStatus}, reg_check_status = ${"#"}{regCheckStatus}, reg_send_status = ${"#"}{regSendStatus}, reg_operate_status = ${"#"}{regOperateStatus} WHERE<#assign x = 0> <#list table.columnList as c> <#if c.isPk == "1"> <#if x !=0 >and </#if>${c.name} = ${"#"}{${c.javaFieldId}} <#assign x = x + 1> </#if> </#list> </update>
</mapper>
